title: Blood Orange Negroni from Bottega Recipe
full_text:
Blood Orange Negroni from Bottega Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1
ounce
Bombay Sapphire
gin
1/2
ounce
Campari
1/2
ounce
sweet vermouth
1
ounce
freshly squeezed
blood orange juice
Garnish:
orange slice
Directions
Fill a mixing glass with ice, add gin, Campari, vermouth, and blood orange juice. Stir well and strain into ice-filled rocks glass.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass and cocktail strainer
Gin
Orange
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
